item.description:
Project Bread's 41st Walk for Hunger is coming this Sunday! Join us for a fun walk to raise money for local food pantries and help us make a difference. This is your chance to come together to take part in the wonderful Massachusetts tradition to help feed hungry families in their community.

Our Asian Meetup group has signed up as a team on the Project Bread Website and have a tentative goal of reaching $200 minimum. If you plan to participate, please contribute $5/person toward the pledge. If you cannot make it and would still like to contribute to our group - please click on the link below. We appreciate your support and hope you can join us.

If you already have your own pledge sheet you are welcome to join us as well. And don't worry if you cannot walk the entire 20 miles - they have shuttle buses all along the route to take you back.

Dress comfortably with sneakers and a light jacket. The weather forecast looks good for Sunday.

Donation Link:
http://www.projectbre...



Meeting Location: Boylston St. Green line T-stop, we will be right outside.
Time: 8:30 am, Sunday May 3rd.
Walking distance: 20 miles

See route map below.
http://www.projectbre...

Co-organizers: Tran, Steve

Tran: 781-484-7913 or tran_arch@yahoo.com

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: 2009 Walk For Hunger
